Title: Relates to certain safety features required on stretch limousines
Summary: Requires stretch limousines to be equipped with roll-over protection devices such as cages or pillars and anti-intrusion bars for the purpose of protecting rear compartment passengers.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to stretch limousine roll-over and anti-intrusion protection; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
